title: Obamacare is Hurting Americans, Hear Their Stories – The White House
content:
Healthcare	

June 22, 2017
1 minute readSeven years after Obamacare was signed into law, its record speaks for itself. Premiums have risen and continue to rise, millions remain uninsured, and insurance providers are fleeing the market faster than ever. Obamacare is failing the American people.Tonya Horton owns a small medical instrument and billing company in Arkansas and Dr. Thomas Little is a cardiologist working in Cookeville, Tennessee. Every day they see the waste and suffering that Obamacare causes. To learn more about their experiences watch both of the videos below.Victims of Obamacare: Tonya HortonVictims of Obamacare: Dr. Thomas LittleWithout action to repeal and replace Obamacare, Americans are stuck with higher costs, more taxes, and fewer choices. The trend of bad news for Obamacare is continuing – Americans need relief now.
